EmailTemplate.name: 17.Radio.5GReality.5GUseCase.T.G.W.16102.Consumer demands drive 5G tech innov..0
EmailTemplate.subject: Qualcomm and Nokia webinar: What are the technology components of 5G New Radio?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
${preheader} View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> What are the technology components of 5G New Radio? October 19, 2017 - 7 a.m. PDT | 10 a.m. EDT | 5 p.m. EEST Duration 1 hour
5G is driving a fundamental change in our communications infrastructure and devices, but the demands placed on the technology are very high. The success of upcoming 5G networks will depend heavily on the adoption of a number of new technologies.
Join our Nokia/Qualcomm webinar to learn about the current status of 5G standardization. We will also look at the key technology components that enable 5G including how to utilize the new spectrum, multi-connectivity, network slicing, and the multi-access edge cloud. <!-- Click here for the complete list of upcoming telco cloud transformation webinars <[[https://pages.nokia.com/Cloud-Webinar-Series.html]]> --> Connect with us © 2017 Nokia. Contact us <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/contact]]> | Privacy policy <[[http://company.nokia.com/en/privacy]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> You are receiving this email because you've subscribed to receive information from Nokia.
